amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to increase funding for Small Business Administration, Entrepreneurial Development Programs by $1 million, with the increase intended to specifically support Growth Accelerators.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
